name: places/ChIJQZaFjI9ZwokRDG88ivWyYk0
formattedAddress: 90 5th Ave 3rd floor, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 90 5th Ave 3rd floor, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Extremely frustrating that Jared is the sole broker representing 25 Monroe Place in Brooklyn Heights. He's aloof and uncommunicative about the availability of units. We reached out about an application the DAY a listing was posted for a unit in this building (we were hoping to apply without attending an open house). It was not communicated to us that visiting the unit was required to apply. We did attend the open house later that week, and applied within 2 hours of seeing the place. While I understand the possibility that applicants submitted ahead of us, there was no communication about the status of our application. Only after I saw the listing changed to "Temporarily Off Market" did I feel comfortable to reach out to find out that someone else got the unit. When we asked for a reason (for example, if it was our application materials), we simply got a terse "Someone got their app in before you" reply. This I am very understanding of. I am just extremely frustrated that the process for living at 25 Monroe Place is made even more opaque and uninviting by Jared. There should be more than this one broker representing 25 Monroe Place for renters. It feels as though you'll never be able to live in this building if he doesn't like you.

originalText.text: We worked with Jared on the purchase of a beautiful Central Park West Co-op overlooking the park. Jared was incredibly helpful as we navigated a tricky seller’s market. His deep subject matter expertise, excellent interpersonal and negotiating skills, and incredibly strong network in NYC positioned us well to compete with what seemed like a huge number of buyers in the market. We were especially impressed with Jared’s patience, professionalism and responsiveness to our very specific needs. Jared is a thoughtful, high integrity guy, and he not only helped us find the home of our dreams, but made the process highly enjoyable along the way.
